bill.title: Relating To Minimum Wage.
bill.description: Changes minimum wage rates annually from 1/1/2020, to 1/1/2024. Provides lower minimum wage rates for employees who receive employer-sponsored health benefits under the Hawaii Prepaid Health Care Act. Includes persons with disabilities under generally applicable minimum wage requirements. (SB789 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to LCA, WAM.
The committee(s) on LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 01-31-19 3:00PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, S. Chang, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara, Fevella ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 605) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-25-19 10:25AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, English, K. Kahele, Kanuha, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Moriwaki, Riviere, Fevella ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Harimoto, Inouye, Kidani.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1122) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-19.

Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Fevella, Ihara, Kim, Moriwaki, Wakai. Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Riviere). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 246) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Tuesday, 03-19-19 9:30AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Eli, Ichiyama, Kitagawa, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Matsumoto; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) McKelvey, Quinlan.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1675) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) DeCoite, Kong, Matsumoto, Okimoto, Tokioka, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Har voting no (1) and Representative(s) Quinlan, Yamane excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 03-29-19 3:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Gates, Hashimoto, Holt, Kitagawa, B. Kobayashi, Matayoshi, Nakamura, Nishimoto, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Eli, Todd, Wildberger, McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2170) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-09-19.

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Matsumoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Cabanilla Arakawa, DeCoite, Har, Kong, Okimoto, Quinlan, Say, Tokioka, Ward voting no (9) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 752).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 893).
House Conferees Appointed: Johanson, Luke Co-Chairs; Cullen, Matsumoto.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 810).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Taniguchi Chair; Keith-Agaran Co-Chair; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 918).
